ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 76. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
